column4: On that Fedora, when you acidently tell it TV mode and you haven't got that hooked up yet to your computer, TV that is, and your screen just turns to a blank screen, even when you reboot the computer every time, How do you correct that so you can get your computer screen back up so you can see things on it until your actually ready to use the TV mode in Fedora?
To use a TV monitor instead of your computer monitor
This happened to me and didn't know what to do, so I just reinstalled the Ubuntu over it again.
